displayName.text: Success Academy Charter School - Harlem 3 Elementary

formattedAddress: 410 E 100th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 410 E 100th St, New York, NY 10029-6604, USA

originalText.text: Unfriendly staff, rude and not helpful. I would not recommend this school. We studied there for 1 year. I asked for information only they could provide and I was literally told that they don't care as my child is not their student any more. They hadn't responded to my emails and hung up on me on the phone.

text.text: Unfriendly staff, rude and not helpful. I would not recommend this school. We studied there for 1 year. I asked for information only they could provide and I was literally told that they don't care as my child is not their student any more. They hadn't responded to my emails and hung up on me on the phone.

originalText.text: This school is by far the worst school I’ve ever sent my child to. I went to pick my child up early for his dental appointment, and the principal didn’t want to give me my child without an early pass. I had to tell his teacher to let him pack his things up so we wouldn't be late and my son was walking towards me the principal squeezed his arm and pulled him back into his class room. And from her doing that has a red bruise on his arm from what she has done and now he’s terrified of going back there. NEVER AGAIN WITH SUCCESS ACADEMY!

originalText.text: Why can't SA send emails and communications to more than 1 email address? As if we do not live in the United States with statistics leaning toward 2 homes for children in 2019. Seems SA is not so Successful with keeping up with the times with technology and communications to 2 parent's.

originalText.text: If I could give this place a zero I would. I had a nephew there and the APs have no idea who to talk properly. They are horrible at speaking respectfully. Never again.

originalText.text: Great School. The culture is so admirable. Highly Recommend! Keeps the parents involved and in the know. Great communication. So happy I chose this school!
